elements.name: User can create new account using valid credentials

steps.name: User Select His date of birth Day "1" Month "10" Year "1997"
User directed to successful register page "https://demo.nopcommerce.com/registerresult/1?returnUrl=/"
A success Message is displayed "Your registration completed"
The color of Success Message should be "rgba(76, 177, 124, 1)"

name: User could register with a new account

elements.name: User could Login Using Valid Credentials

elements.name: A success Message Appears when user Add product to wish list

steps.name: User Clicks on WishList button of product number "2"
A success Message is displayed to inform user that Product has been added to WishList
The color of WishList Success Message should be "#4bb07a"

elements.name: Quantity of the product increases after adding product to wish list

steps.name: User Clicks on WishList button of product number "2"
User Navigates to wish list page
Quantity of the product should be increased in wish list page

name: User could add products to Wish List
